title: Smooth Tuorial ? SkinsSpotlight Camera
body:
Hey guys,

My name is RektboiHD and I make League of Legends Edits. Many guys ask me, how to do some smooths/cinematics like I use in my videos. You can check out my videos here : RektboiHD | Youtube

So I just wanted to ask, who of you would like to see a tutorial about this. Just let me know, and I will do a tutorial about it, so you can make your own edits :)

( Sorry that I speak English, but I'm German and just wanted to ask you guys also )

replies.body: Wow amazing :) i would watch a tutorial on this 100% sure :D never had the time to watch its features by myself, always too lazy >_<
